description: CDM for Party domain in the Master Data Management system

entities.name: Party
entities.description: A person or organization that can enter into business relationships

entities.name: Person
entities.description: A human being with personal information

entities.name: Organization
entities.description: A legal entity, company, or institution

entities.name: PartyRelationship
entities.description: A business relationship between two parties

entities.name: CustomerRelationship
entities.description: A relationship where one party is a customer of another

entities.name: PartyLocation
entities.description: A geographic location associated with a party

entities.name: ContactPoint
entities.description: A means of contacting a party

entities.name: PartyReference
entities.description: A reference to a party in an external directory

relationships.name: party_has_locations
relationships.description: A party may have multiple locations

relationships.name: party_has_contact_points
relationships.description: A party may have multiple contact points

relationships.name: party_has_party_references
relationships.description: A party may be referenced in multiple directories

relationships.name: party_has_relationships
relationships.description: A party may have multiple relationships with other parties

relationships.name: party_relationship_has_agreements
relationships.description: A party relationship may be governed by multiple agreements

relationships.name: party_location_at_location
relationships.description: Multiple party locations may reference the same location

relationships.name: person_has_profile
relationships.description: A person has one profile with additional information

relationships.name: organization_has_locations
relationships.description: An organization may have multiple locations
